tree.speaker: User
tree.text: What is the capital of France?

children.speaker: Model A
children.text: The capital of France is Paris. It has been the capital since the 10th century and is known for landmarks like the Eiffel Tower.

children.speaker: Model A
children.text: Paris has a population of about 2.1 million in the city proper, and over 12 million in the metropolitan area.

children.speaker: Model B
children.text: Paris is the capital of France.

children.speaker: Model A
children.text:
Fingers tap the keys
Bugs emerge from tangled code
Coffee saves the day

children.speaker: Model B
children.text:
Lines of logic flow
Silicon dreams come alive
Compile, run, debug

children.speaker: Model C
children.text:
Brackets close like gates
Functions call through morning mist
Tests all passing green
